DOC.brief_summary: Multicentre, retrospective observational cohort study based on LHU administrative databases aimed to described the pharmacoutilization of antipsychotics in patients affected by schizophrenia and bipolar disorder, the resource consumption and medication adherence. A sub analysis will be performed for those patients switching from Quetiapine IR to Quetiapine XR and comparing the periods before and after the switch.
DOC.brief_title: IBIS: Italian Burden of Illness on Schizophrenia & Bipolar Disorder
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of Schizophrenia or BD (appendix for ICD910 codes) or an antipsychotic prescription during the period 1/1/200930/06/2010 patients must be assisted in the LHU for the year before the enrollment ( period 1/1/200930/06/2010) until 31/12/2010 or death date if earlier
